projects.category: React.JS, Axios, RESTful APIs, HTML and CSS
projects.title: Star Wars Character Search API
projects.description: This app is used to search for the details of your favorite Star Wars characters. It is designed to be response with React.JS and the Axios library to make HTTP GET request to swapi.dev. You are able to scroll through every page for new characters, or search for them by name.

projects.title: Simple React Expense Tracker
projects.description: This is a simple and easy to use expense tracker designed in React.JS. It allows a user to pick a date, cost, location, and purchase description and add it to a list of expenses.

projects.title: Javascript Calculator
projects.description: This is an application designed in Vanilla JS to mimic all of the basic functionality of a standard calculator. It supports basic operations, and is able to store and recall memory. Don't be fooled by its simplicity. This project contains very complex logic to function properly and took quite some time to complete
